lead_paragraph: Mallex Smith hit a three-run triple in the second inning, Mike Foltynewicz continued his recent upswing by allowing only three hits and one run in six-plus innings and the Atlanta Braves beat Jeff Samardzija and the San Francisco Giants 5-3 on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Mallex Smith's 3-Run Triple Powers Braves Past Giants, 5-3
headline.main: Mallex Smith's 3-Run Triple Powers Braves Past Giants, 5-3
